title: 2 Planes Crash Mid-Air at Air Show at Dallas Executive Airport
description: The crash involved two World War II-era planes at an air show in Dallas with as many as six people on board, though officials as of Saturday night had not yet confirmed casualties.
dc:creator: Margarita Birnbaum and Vimal Patel

media:content.media:credit: Nathaniel Ross/Nathaniel Ross Photography, via Associated Press
media:content.media:description: Two World War II-era military planes collided in midair at an air show at Dallas Executive Airport on Saturday in Texas.
